column1: Kata Robata////Aside from the usual sushi/nigiri options
column2: there are some key items you mustttt try here! The uni king crab spoon
column4: pork shumai and lobster Mac and cheese are all items you should try at least once here. The uni crab spoon will change your life
column5: I have yet to come here with someone who has not enjoyed the uni spoon. Lol
